thread.title: 49ers’ Ahmad Brooks takes time off to be with his family
thread.title_full: 49ers’ Ahmad Brooks takes time off to be with his family - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Eric Branch
title: 49ers’ Ahmad Brooks takes time off to be with his family
text:
Photo: Norm Hall, Getty Images Ahmad Brooks is alone on the 49ers’ roster with over 10 career sacks. Ahmad Brooks is alone on the 49ers’ roster with over 10 career...
Outside linebacker Ahmad Brooks was away from the 49ers on Wednesday for family reasons, head coach Jim Tomsula said. Ahmad Brooks is alone on the 49ers’ roster with over 10 career sacks. Ahmad Brooks is alone on the 49ers’ roster with over 10 career...
Outside linebacker Ahmad Brooks was away from the 49ers on Wednesday for family reasons, head coach Jim Tomsula said.
